QuestData.Title: Half-Ton Holdouts
QuestData.Description: My grunts have got this dragon problem under control. Besides, I can't have an upstart $c like you barging in and ruining our battle plans.$b$bYou want work? Fine, I'll give you work. Investigate the ogre camp to our southwest. From what I've heard, a small army of combatants seems to have appeared outside of their hovel.$b$bWe can't sit and wait for them to flank us, soldier... especially while we're already embroiled with black dragons. Thin their ranks before they thin ours.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 12 Dustbelcher Combatants. You may kill Dustbelcher Maulers or Dustbelcher Shaman.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well? What are you waiting for?
QuestData.RewardText: You've got the hint of a hero in you, $r.$b$bNow get out of my battlefield.
